item.title: Lesson1
item.description: Lesson 1 The lesson where Mr. Boskind dances around What did we learn? Today, we recapped on [[angels]]] and vortexes. We watched some seemingly useless dance turn into a informative recap of angles and counter clockwise and clockwise. We also learned the importance of perseptiveness. Using counter clockwise and clockwise is a more efficient way of telling if the shape turns left or right, drawing a clock over the square is an easy way to tell which way it is turning.
